_package_info.description: Common fantasy races like elves, dwarves, orcs, and their subraces
_package_info.author: Storymaster

race.name: Human
race.description: Versatile and ambitious, humans are the most adaptable race

race.name: Elf
race.description: Long-lived and graceful, with natural affinity for magic

race.name: Dwarf
race.description: Stout and hardy folk, masters of craftsmanship and mountain lore

race.name: Halfling
race.description: Small in stature but large in courage, love comfort and good food

race.name: Orc
race.description: Powerful and fierce warriors with strong tribal bonds

race.name: Gnome
race.description: Small, clever folk with natural curiosity and magical aptitude

sub_race.name: High Elf
sub_race.description: Elite elves with strong magical abilities and noble bearing

sub_race.name: Wood Elf
sub_race.description: Forest-dwelling elves with exceptional archery skills

sub_race.name: Dark Elf
sub_race.description: Underground elves adapted to life in darkness

sub_race.name: Mountain Dwarf
sub_race.description: Hardy dwarves from high peaks, skilled in combat

sub_race.name: Hill Dwarf
sub_race.description: Dwarves from rolling hills, known for their wisdom

sub_race.name: Lightfoot Halfling
sub_race.description: Nimble halflings who can blend into crowds easily

sub_race.name: Stout Halfling
sub_race.description: Sturdy halflings with resistance to poison

sub_race.name: Forest Gnome
sub_race.description: Gnomes who live in harmony with woodland creatures

sub_race.name: Rock Gnome
sub_race.description: Inventive gnomes with natural tinkering abilities
